name: Survive Chaos And Apocalypse
description:
A virus devastated with humanity leaving everyone in quarantine, many people died, others were left without symptoms but carried the virus. Because so many people have died and the world has come to a standstill with only a few essential services running, the planet has collapsed enormously. With more people still dying of hunger and the virus, the world was left without law and complete chaos. You will be ex-military man Samuel, who will have to fight and survive with all his strength to find food for his wife and daughter who are hidden in a basement of a house. Samuel will have to look for supplies, but it won't be that simple. A group called The SaqYin are looters without compassion and without mercy, they plunder everything and everyone. Samuel will have to fight these looters in three different places to get food for his family.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Switch Weapons: 1, 2 or 3

Jump: Space

Shoot: Mouse Left

Reload: R
